articles.title: African-American doctor alleges hospital racism before dying of COVID - New York Daily News
articles.description: An African-American doctor who died of coronavirus left a message about racial disparity not just when it comes to how COVID-19 itself affects people of color but also about medical establishment's attitudes toward Black patients' assessment of their own pain.
